entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text:
@realDonaldTrump @CNN Pathological liar, corrupt criminal #donaldtrump BRAGGED of a final total of 60,000 deaths by August (good news to him). But we have 61,472 today on April 29. Something 
isn't adding up here. I don't understand.
#TrumpIsA_DANGER_ToAmerica
#TrumpLiesPeopleDie
